attributes.action: contact the International Olympic Committee and propose to add Lacrosse as an olympic sport and to include it in the 2016 Olympics.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Lacrosse is a very strenuous physical team sport which has been played for many years across the world. Although it is not a very well known sport we would like to change that. The sport only needs a grass pitch, although it is a winter sport. Please think about making it an olympic sport. Thank you.

rejection.details: Please supply full name and address information.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
False or incomplete name or address information
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
